markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Limited">
[Mantis Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=2129)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Prey for Death</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Prey for Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=231) pg. 109

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You become a mantis. You gain the effects of [_insect form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1575), heightened to mantis form's level, and you can only transform into a mantis.
name: Mantis Form

text: Mantis Form Two Actions May contain spoilers from Prey for Death Source Prey for Death pg. 109 Duration 1 minute --- You become a mantis. You gain the effects of insect form , heightened to mantis form's level, and you can only transform into a mantis.
